Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory37.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Gargh... Now we should be safe...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "...Whoa! It's Michael!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "He's from t-that movie... When did he start following us?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Right from the beginning. He showed no harm, so I didn't take action.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I see... I thought this was "The Darkening"", but it turned out to be ""that movie"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Wow... Lucky I watched "that movie" without letting Capt know...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What\'s "that movie"?', 3: '8', 4: 'Why not let him know?', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Oh, Wanshi got a movie...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The name was "The Darkening"". It was supposed to be a ""horror movie," so Capt never let us play it in the preparation room...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Um, this is only between the two of us... Capt thought the taste of that movie was "extremely poor," so he never allowed us to watch it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Plus, only the beginning was almost identical to "The Darkening", but the story was quite different...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "So I didn't recognize it until we got here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "What's with this place?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'This is where the movie ended. The home of that scary killer with a mask.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'You know, the typical horror movie ending, where everything ends at where they begins.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't see any logic at all...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's why you never watch horror movies, right? Lee?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I just cannot understand the fun of those completely illogical works.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'See, Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Anyway, this is probably our only chance of beating that masked killer.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alright... What should we do?', 3: '28', 4: 'The only chance?', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's the problem... I don't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'When Wanshi and I almost finished the movie... The file was corrupted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "So I didn't get to see the ending.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Alright... What should we do?', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Right. According to the movie's background, the killer is only mortal inside this house.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Which means we can only kill him within the house.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That's the problem... I don't know.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'When Wanshi and I almost finished the movie... The file was corrupted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You suddenly hear a squeaking sound from behind. Someone is trying to break through the door.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You also notice a few silhouettes not far ahead.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You can choose to ask someone for help, but their response may not be in your best interest.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You only have one chance. The squeaking sound has stopped, which means the killer is already behind your back.'}
